post.description: Register or update a user\'s FCM token. Requires JWT authorization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: FCM token data for the authenticated user

204.description: FCM token registered or updated successfully (No Content)

500.description: Internal server error while processing FCM token

get.description: Validates a JWT and returns user information if the token is valid.

200.description: User data extracted from valid JWT.

403.description: Forbidden - Access to the resource is prohibited

post.description: Sends a confirmation code to the user\'s email.
Verifies the confirmation code sent to the user\'s email. Delete the code after
Creates a new user. Deletes the code sent to the email after validation.

patch.description: Edit the authenticated user. All fields are optional; only provided fields will be updated.
Allows the authenticated user to update their password using a verification code sent to their email. The email must match the one in the JWT token.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token (JWT) for user authentication

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Verification code and new password to update the current password

403.description: The email in the token does not match the body email

428.description: Precondition Required - the code has expired or was never sent

500.description: Server error while trying to update password

get.description: Returns additional information for the authenticated user.  **Structure of 'info':**  - The \`info\` object can contain any number of key-value pairs.  - Each key is a string, and each value must be an **array of strings**.  - This allows users to store flexible, categorized metadata (e.g., genres, interests, platforms).   **Warning:**  - The server does not validate the keys inside \`info\`; only the value format is expected (array of strings).  - Ensure consistent naming on the client side to avoid data fragmentation (e.g., avoid using both 'Genres' and 'genres').   **Example:**  {  "info": {  "genres": ["rock", "electronic"],  "platforms": ["Instagram", "Spotify"],  "interests": ["coding", "DJing"]  }  }

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token (JWT) for user authentication

404.description: No additional information found for this user

error.example: No additional information found for this user.

500.description: Server error while retrieving additional information

parameters.description: ID of the song to update description for

description.example: New description text for the song

get.summary: Get a list of songs by IDs
get.description: Returns detailed information for the given array of song IDs. Only non-deleted songs are returned.

200.description: Array of song objects successfully returned

400.description: Bad request – invalid or missing songIds

error.example: The field songIds is required and must be an array of positive integers
Error trying to get song list

delete.description: Deletes a song by its ID. Removes associated image and audio, then marks the record as deleted. Only the owner or an admin may perform this action.

parameters.name: idsong
parameters.description: ID of the song whose image will be deleted

patch.summary: Upload or update an image for a song
patch.description: Allows a user to upload or replace the image associated with a song. Only the owner of the song or an admin can perform this action.

parameters.name: idsong
parameters.description: ID of the song whose image will be updated

parameters.name: imagefile
parameters.description: Image file to be uploaded. Must be PNG or JPEG.

400.description: Invalid file or missing required data

403.description: User is not authorized to update this song image

get.description: Returns the lastest song og the given user.

parameters.description: ID of the user (AppUser) whose songs are to be retrieved

200.description: List of user songs returned successfully.

get.summary: Get all songs created by a user
get.description: Returns a list of all songs uploaded by a given user.

parameters.name: idAppUser
parameters.description: ID of the user (AppUser) whose songs are to be retrieved

200.description: List of user songs returned successfully.

get.summary: Get most popular songs with optional filters
get.description: Recovers the most popular songs. Se debe enviar al menos uno de los filtros: songName, artistName o idGenre.

parameters.name: songName
parameters.description: Name of the song

parameters.name: artistName
parameters.description: the name of the author of the song

parameters.name: idGenre
parameters.description: idgenre of song

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Máximo número de canciones a devolver (default: 10).

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Número de canciones a omitir (default: 0).

400.description: Faltan todos los filtros obligatorios (se requiere al menos uno).

error.example: Debes enviar al menos uno de estos parámetros en query: songName, artistName o idGenre.

get.summary: Get most popular songs by month
get.description: Retrieves detailed information about the top songs in a given month and year, ordered by total playCount.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Number of songs to retrieve (max 60)

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Four-digit year (e.g. 2025)

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Month number (1-12)

200.description: List of most popular songs returned successfully.

404.description: No popular songs found for the specified period

patch.summary: Remove a song from a playlist
patch.description: Removes a song from a playlist. Only the owner of the playlist or an administrator can perform this action. Throws an error if the song does not exist in the playlist.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer JWT token to authenticate the user

parameters.name: idsong
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the song to be removed from the playlist

parameters.name: idPlaylist
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the playlist from which the song will be removed

204.description: Song successfully removed from playlist (no content)

403.description: User is not authorized to modify the playlist

409.description: Song is not in the playlist

error.example: Song 1 is not in the playlist
Internal error trying to remove song from playlist

patch.summary: Add a song to a playlist
patch.description: Adds a song (by its ID) to a playlist (by its ID). Only the playlist owner or an admin is authorized to perform this action. Duplicate songs are not allowed.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer JWT token to authenticate the user

parameters.name: idsong
parameters.description: Numeric ID of the song to be added to the playlist

parameters.name: idPlaylist
parameters.description: MongoDB ObjectId of the playlist to which the song will be added

204.description: Song successfully added to playlist (no content)

400.description: Invalid ID format or other bad request error

error.example: Invalid song or playlist ID format

403.description: User does not own the playlist or is not authorized

409.description: The song is already in the playlist

error.example: Song 1 is already in the playlist
Internal error trying to add song to playlist

delete.description: Elimina una playlist del sistema. Solo puede hacerlo el propietario o un administrador. También elimina la imagen asociada del sistema de archivos.

parameters.description: Bearer token JWT para autenticar al usuario

parameters.name: idPlaylist
parameters.description: ID de la playlist a eliminar

Error trying to delete the playlist. CALL NAVI

put.summary: Crear una nueva playlist con imagen
put.description: Permite a un usuario autenticado subir una nueva playlist con su imagen asociada. La imagen debe ser PNG o JPG. El nombre de la playlist es obligatorio. Se guarda en el servidor y se registra en la base de datos.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token JWT para autenticar al usuario

parameters.name: image
parameters.description: Imagen PNG o JPG de la playlist (máx. 20MB)

parameters.name: playlistName
parameters.description: Nombre de la playlist

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Descripción opcional de la playlist

400.description: Falta algún campo obligatorio o archivo inválido

post.summary: Increment or create monthly play count
post.description: Increments the play count for the current month. If no record exists for that month, creates it with playCount=1.

parameters.name: idsong
parameters.description: ID of the song to increment
